00310 // Implementation of inlined methods. ---
00311 
00312 #define CHECK_RET_LESS(x) if ( this->x != other.x ) {\
00313                              return this->x < other.x; }
00314 
00315 inline bool
00316 TileMapParams::operator<( const TileMapParams& other ) const
00317 {
00318    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_tileIndexLat );
00319    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_tileIndexLon );
00320    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_serverPrefix );
00321    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_gzip );
00322    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_layer );
00323    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_mapOrStrings );
00324    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_importanceNbr );
00325    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_langType );
00326    CHECK_RET_LESS( m_detailLevel );
00327    
00328    if ( ( m_routeID != NULL ) && ( other.m_routeID != NULL ) ) {
00329       // Compare the values of routeIDs if none is null
00330       CHECK_RET_LESS( m_routeID->toNav2Int64() );
00331    } else {
00332       // Compare pointers when one is or both are NULL
00333       CHECK_RET_LESS( m_routeID );
00334    }
00335    // Same
00336    return false;
00337 }
00338 
00339 #undef CHECK_RET_LESS

00349 inline void
00350 TileMapParams::setParams( uint32 serverPrefix,
00351                          int gzip, 
00352                          int layer,
00353                          TileMapTypes::tileMap_t mapOrStrings,
00354                          int importanceNbr,
00355                          LangTypes::language_t langType,
00356                          int32 tileIndexLat,
00357                          int32 tileIndexLon,
00358                          int detailLevel,
00359                          const RouteID* routeID) 
00360 {
00361    delete m_paramString;
00362    m_paramString = NULL;
00363    m_serverPrefix = serverPrefix;
00364    m_gzip = gzip;
00365    m_layer = layer;
00366    m_mapOrStrings = mapOrStrings;
00367    m_importanceNbr = importanceNbr;
00368    m_langType = langType;
00369    m_tileIndexLat = tileIndexLat;
00370    m_tileIndexLon = tileIndexLon;
00371    m_detailLevel = detailLevel;
00372    m_valid = true;
00373    
00374    if ( routeID != NULL ) {
00375       delete m_routeID;
00376       m_routeID = new RouteID( *routeID );
00377    }
00378 }
